fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / GORACY KUBEK
fields.Description: A dialogue with a kojko cook Gorący Kubek. He doesn't speak a word from your language, but for some reason understands all your questions about disposing the corpse??

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""I need a fridge to store a corpse.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need a fridge to store a corpse."

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: ""No, no." He nods confidently. "I k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no." He nods confidently. "I know."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's from Graad -- a Kojko," the l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's from Graad -- a Kojko," the lieutenant informs you.

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "The cook looks at you doing the cha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cook looks at you doing the charade and smiles.

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: ""Ooh!" His eyes light up with under..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ooh!" His eyes light up with understanding, then instantly grow dark again. "No, no," he shakes his head, "Body no fit fridge. Fridge small."

fields.Title: You: ""What is in that borscht you're mak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is in that borscht you're making there?" (Point to the large pot.)

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "The cook shakes his head and rattle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cook shakes his head and rattles off a sequence of undecipherable words. He then returns to his smoking, ash falling from between his fingers.

fields.Title: You: ""Sorry, I don't understand you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry, I don't understand you."

fields.Title: Untitled hub (02)
Gorący Kubek: "The man ponders his cooking utensil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man ponders his cooking utensils and gives you a little nod, acknowledging your presence.

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "Just one word. Sounds quizzical. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just one word. Sounds quizzical. Then he awaits your answer with his brow arched.

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "The man puts his cup down and repli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man puts his cup down and replies something, his left hand drawing arcs in the air.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We speak *Suresne*. There is no su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We speak *Suresne*. There is no such thing as the *Revacholian language*," he sighs. "But don't worry, your message remained clear."

fields.Title: You: ""Leo said you're friends with Mañan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Leo said you're friends with Mañana. Is that true?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.find_out_whats_happening_with_the_special_brew_strikers_are_eating"] == true  and  Variable["cargo.kubek_asked_goracy_about_manana"] == false  and  Variable["gates.manana_greeting_done"] == true

fields.Title: Jump to: [Main hub]
Gorący Kubek: ""*Barszcz* need…" He looks at the s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Barszcz* need…" He looks at the soup, then at you. "More *wódka*?" He picks up a bottle from the shelf.

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "The man takes another drag of his c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man takes another drag of his cigarette and shakes his head, smiling widely. It's not clear whether he understood your question.

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
You: ""By the way, we speak Revacholian i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By the way, we speak Revacholian in Revachol." (Get your Revacholian Nationhood on.)

fields.Title: corpsehub
Gorący Kubek: "The man says a couple of sentences..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man says a couple of sentences in that strange language of his and then seems to wait for you to speak.

fields.Title: You: ""No." (Shake your head.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." (Shake your head.)

fields.Title: Untitled hub (03)
Gorący Kubek: "The cook gives you a long inspectin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cook gives you a long inspecting look, then shrugs too and seems to wait for you to speak.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think he understands, offi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think he understands, officer... We need to find some other way to make ourselves clear."

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.goracy_logic_it_is_his_name"]
Variable["whirling.goracy_logic_it_is_his_name"]
!(Variable["whirling.goracy_logic_it_is_his_name"])
Gorący Kubek: "The cook is still smoking, ash fall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cook is still smoking, ash falling from between his fingers. His hands are large and clean.

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "The mention of 'Mañana' gets his at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The mention of 'Mañana' gets his attention. He smiles and delivers a whole slew of unfamiliar words and lively gestures. Then he falls silent again.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Main hub]
Gorący Kubek: ""Mhm." He nods confidently. "I know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm." He nods confidently. "I know."

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "With the mention of the word *Kojko..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With the mention of the word *Kojko* the cook starts talking excessively, his hands up in the air again.

fields.Title: You: ""Ah, Gorący! I have some questions..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, Gorący! I have some questions to ask!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Main hub]
You: ""How do you know? Maybe it's a smal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you know? Maybe it's a small body."

fields.Title: Authority: "It doesn't matter -- you're a polic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It doesn't matter -- you're a police officer, you can do anything you want.

fields.Title: You: ""Hello, sir. Got time for a few que..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello, sir. Got time for a few questions?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Main hub]
Jump to: [Main hub]
Conceptualization: "He doesn't know your language, you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't know your language, you can just say something cool in return.

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Gorący Kubek: "The man keeps shaking his head. His..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man keeps shaking his head. His eyes seem sad. Then he starts swiping crumbs off the counter top.

fields.Title: You: ""I know, Kim... I know." (Make stab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know, Kim... I know." (Make stabbing motions at the meat on the cutting board.)

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "He smiles and nods enthusiastically..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He smiles and nods enthusiastically, and, chattering away in his language, ladles some brew into a small thermal cup. Then hands it to you.

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie")
Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie")
!(Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie"))
IsNight()
IsNight()
!(IsNight())
Gorący Kubek: "The man nods at you, checks his wat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man nods at you, checks his watch and sighs, "Ai-ai-ai..."

fields.Title: Logic: "It's late. He's working."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's late. He's working.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Speak Revacholian?" The lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Speak Revacholian?" The lieutenant raises his eyebrows.

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.coracy_rhetoric_a_question"]
Variable["whirling.coracy_rhetoric_a_question"]
!(Variable["whirling.coracy_rhetoric_a_question"])
You: "Ignore him. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Ignore him. [Leave.]

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Rhetoric: "I'm pretty sure he asked you a ques..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm pretty sure he asked you a question.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes." (Nod.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." (Nod.)

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Variable["whirling.goracy_main_hub_reached"]
Variable["whirling.goracy_main_hub_reached"]
!(Variable["whirling.goracy_main_hub_reached"])
Composure: "Shrugging is an international sign..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shrugging is an international sign for: 'No, I don't know what's behind that door'.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You can always talk your way out if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can always talk your way out if things go sour.

fields.Title: Logic: "It must be his name. Gorący, Gorący..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It must be his name. Gorący, Gorący Kubek... Sounds representative.

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "A thin man is smoking below an exha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A thin man is smoking below an exhaust hood, occasionally sipping from his mug. This must be the Whirling's cook.

fields.Title: Logic: "Okay, it's definitely not his name...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, it's definitely not his name. Whatever you do, please don't call him Gorący Kubek! Please. It's not funny.

fields.Title: Jump to: [corpsehub]
You: ""Mercury rising." (Run your fingers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mercury rising." (Run your fingers through your hair.)

fields.Title: Main hub
You: ""Wait, what language is he speaking?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, what language is he speaking?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Doesn't matter... I don't think he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Doesn't matter... I don't think he understood us anyway. He wouldn't be smiling if he did."

fields.Title: You: ""I need to put a dead body in this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need to put a dead body in this fridge." (Point to the fridge.)

fields.Title: Jump to: [Main hub]
Horrific Necktie: "Vodka-borscht! I love it, *bratan*!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Vodka-borscht! I love it, *bratan*! Turn it the fuck up and then ask for some yourself.

fields.Title: Empathy: "They're friends."
fields.Dialogue Text: They're friends.

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's happy for some reason."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's happy for some reason.

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "As you step in, he nods towards the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you step in, he nods towards the table and says something in a completely foreign language. The only words you can make out are 'gorący' and 'kubek'.

fields.Title: You: ""Gorący, could I have some of that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gorący, could I have some of that brew?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, so it's vodka that keeps the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, so it's vodka that keeps the men happy and in good spirits." He nods. "Clever move by the Union."

fields.Title: Authority: "Listen to him. This is a man who cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Listen to him. This is a man who clearly knows about bodies and fridges -- and bodies fitting into fridges.

fields.Title: You: ""You wouldn't mind if I were to boi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You wouldn't mind if I were to boil some boots here, would you?"

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "He smiles, nodding vigorously, then..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He smiles, nodding vigorously, then pours half a bottle of vodka into the pot. With a whistle he stirs the brew.

fields.Title: Jump to: [corpsehub]
Gorący Kubek: "The cook gives you a long disappoin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cook gives you a long disappointed look, then turns the stove off and seems to wait for you to speak.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why am *I* the corpse?!" He turns..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why am *I* the corpse?!" He turns his eyes to the cook, who gives you both a big bright smile.

fields.Title: You: ""Speak Revacholian, yes. Not this f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Speak Revacholian, yes. Not this funky thing he's spurting out here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good thing he didn't understand a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good thing he didn't understand a word of your stupidity," he concludes.

fields.Title: You: ""Do you know what's behind that doo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you know what's behind that door?" (Point to the blue door.)

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "He looks up at you, then looks away..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He looks up at you, then looks away quickly, shrugging and muttering something to himself.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Main hub]
You: ""Mr. Kubek? I'm here on official po..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mr. Kubek? I'm here on official police business."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't think I need anything else..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think I need anything else. Stay masculine!" [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""I need to get the corpse..." (Poin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need to get the corpse..." (Point to Kim) "... into the fridge!" (Point to the fridge.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are you doing?!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you doing?!"

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "He smiles and bangs his ladle again..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He smiles and bangs his ladle against each of his pots in turn.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes." (Nod and turn your fingers c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." (Nod and turn your fingers clockwise.) "Turn the *wódka* up."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, we have our answer. It won't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, we have our answer. It won't fit. We need a bigger fridge."

fields.Title: Logic: "Turning it up seems like a dangerou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Turning it up seems like a dangerous idea, honestly. The place is a powder keg.

fields.Title: Gorący Kubek: "The cook says something. It's quite..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cook says something. It's quite animated, but you still don't understand.

fields.Title: You: ""You've got some impressive pots th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've got some impressive pots there."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "It's almost like music, especially..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's almost like music, especially with the sounds of assorted dishes boiling and simmering on the stove.

fields.Title: You: ""I'll leave the cooking to you." (S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll leave the cooking to you." (Shrug.) "I have business."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay then."

fields.Title: You: "Point towards the fridge."
fields.Dialogue Text: Point towards the fridge.

fields.Title: You: ""This man is a foreigner!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This man is a foreigner!"

fields.Title: You: ""No! No *wódka*!" (Turn your finger..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No! No *wódka*!" (Turn your fingers counter-clockwise.) "Cut it."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Of course! Vodka! Now that makes it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course! Vodka! Now that makes it a very very special borscht indeed! Turn it up and then ask for some yourself!

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "He's from Graad. People from Graad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's from Graad. People from Graad don't mind if they're called by their national derogatives. It's okay to call him a *Kojko*.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "He *knows* correctly. It is too sma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He *knows* correctly. It is too small.

fields.Title: greeting hub
Jump to: [Main hub]
